I was looking for a delicious and healthy place to take my husband on our recent trip to Barcelona. He's a guy who could live off of pizza and chicken strips, but he promised to do whatever I wanted on this trip since he gets to go to El Clasico.  I ordered the small goat cheese salad and lasagna. He ordered the Seiten Burger (go figure). The flavors in my salad were balanced and interesting, and it was so filling, I boxed my lasagna to go (which was slightly on the salty side, but very good later). He ate his whole meal and said he'd do it again (progress!). I was really excited about their juicery because I just came off a juice cleanse and didn't want to eat out constantly.  I bought 8 cold pressed juices to go. So far, the Coco Masalachai is super tasty. Prices were equivalent to what I'm used to in Houston, TX,  USA.
